sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Iji mee emume icheta ụbọchị a kpọrọ "World Youth Skill Day", nke bụ ụbọchị Julaị 15 nke afọ ọbụla, BBC Igbo ga-ele Michael Ugochukwu Onyezebe anya.
Michael Ugochukwu Onyezebe bụ nwa ikoroọbịa na-eji zobo eme mmanya a na-aṅụ anụ.
Ihe pụrụ iche na nke ya bụ na ọ na-etinye ya n'akpa dịka 'tea' nke bekee na-akpọ 'tea bag'.
Eji m osisi dịka nkụ arụpụta ihe gbara igbo gharịị - Samson Ejiofor
Enwere m olileanya na ụgbọelu m rụrụ ga-efeli otu ụbọchị dịka nke Wright Brothers - Kenneth Akobundu
'Oyiyi m yiri Michael Jackson mere ka m gbawa egwu ka ya' - African Michael Jackson
Michael wekara ndị ntorobịa dịka ya n'ọrụ
Michael nwere ọzụzụ imepụta ọgwụ na mahadum, nke bekee na-akpọ 'pharmacist'.
Mana ọ gbanweela amamihe ahụ werezie ya na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ bụ ọkaibe.
Gere akụkọ ya ebe a.
Ndị mere akụkọ a bụ Chiemela Mgbeahuru na Chukwunaeme Obiejesi.
Ụmụntoroọbịa
Ịji ego achụ ego
